name: Aidan Hanson
text: Great Pizza, nobody outpizzas the hut! I've been going to Dominoes all my life, but its worth the extra buck for better pizza!

name: Abby Arguelles
text: Such a great location- food is hot and delicious. Kellie answered the phone promptly and when I arrived, I got to chit chat with Ashley. Both were so pleasant and made the overall experience one I look forward to having again! :D

name: Che W
text: This is the worst pizza hut EVER. They never have drivers to deliver and will only tell you this after they have taken your credit card number and charged your card. If they do have drivers the pizza is underdone. The worst customer service I have ever had. Do not order from this location.

name: septembersporthorses Kyle
text: They have really stepped up their game, ordered 2 pizzas last night and they were both great.  The girl who answered the phone  D. was sweet and helpful! Will definitely order from there again

name: melissa m
text: We ordered 2 pizzas to be delivered. We recieved the wrong pizza and tried to call back to let them know. Ashley stated she hadn't taken any order in 2 hours. She was very very rude and even cursed me out telling me "that's why you got the …More

name: D22016
text: This pizza hut is absolutely awsome, The girl that was up at the front Ashley she's really super friendly and cute which makes going to this pizza hut worth the trip everytime.

name: Babette Cosby
text: Great service! Pizza was delicious.

name: taylor duh
text: Great food , cooked thoroughly , outstanding customer service And overall a pretty decent place .

name: James dean
text: I came in around rush hour expecting it to be busy however , the cooks josh and april were on top of every move . Instead of being at a slow pace they were on top of every order making sure it was done in a timely manner . My pizza came out …More

name: jaxson max
text: I came into this store today expecting poor service by all the bad reviews . However the cashier was extremely cheerful which gave off positive vibes , the cooks made my pizzas in a timely manner AND it was fresh . May i say THANK YOU PIZZA HUT TEAM MEMBERS!!!

name: Suzanna Arguelles
text: every time i go to this store my food is freshly made & given to me in a timely manner . i couldn’t be any more grateful for the customer service i was given to today . the manager on duty was so sweet and polite it was shocking . i’d recommend this pizza hut to anyone .

name: Kevin Marshall
text: I order online via the app for 7:00 I called at 7:10 was told driver left 10 minutes ago. Called back at 7:20 told driver left 10 minutes ago called at 7:35 was told the driver left 2 minutes ago.  .   Because of their  shenanigans I had NOTHING to eat at work during my meal break.  .    . Don't order from here

name: Daphne Gilmer
text: Pizza Hut now has Cinnabon! Oh my God...these are so good! Maybe I should have eaten my pizza first.

name: Hannah P Cooper
text: I carried out from this location. Inside and in the bathroom are very clean. However, the crust of my pizza and the bottom layer of dough were very undercooked. This made it impossible to eat. I'll still take it home and cook it in my own oven until it is all the way cooked.

name: Jason Bourn
text: Had the best pizza from Pizza Hut that I've ever had at this location. Was getting bad pies from the place closest to me so I opted to carry out from a different location. I'm really glad I chose this one, will definitely be coming back to this location.

name: Mary Swinehart
text: Pizza was great. I ordered a thin and crispy and unlike some other places it really was thin and crispy.

name: zack sparks
text: Pizza wasn't ready until twice the estimated time and boneless chicken wings were disgusting.

name: Jannefer Barker
text: Pizza Hut in general has been failing tremendously in service lately but this location is terrible. Never recieved my order and had to call to get a refund. If you like to never receive you food please order from them.

name: Bajan Dang
text: I’m over this place. I bought pasta and it felt like it was microwaved really poorly and didn’t even make a effort to make it real. Second I bought “cheese sticks” in which they just put cheese on top of breadsticks. This is very disappointing and I want to help them out but I can’t.

name: H.S. Hilburn IV
text: Just tried to order pizzas and was told deliver would be 1 1/2 hours.  Ok, no big deal, I will do carry out.  They tried 4 times to take my order and then they tell me the deal they offered me is unavailable.  Papa John's here we come.  Get …More

name: Venkatagiri Venkatasamy
text: I ordered a pizza which was either not well cooked, or stale. I felt like throwing up before finishing the first slice. So, I returned it back to store (minis 1 slice). They acted asif they couldn't care less. I requested the manager to …More

name: Scott Christie
text: Good. Better than Papa John's which we don't go to because they fired the old CEO

name: Alex Boyum
text: My wife and I ordered two large pizzas and some breadsticks we showed up 5 minutes after they said that the pizzas will be done, there was a line of people so my wife sat down and 15 minutes later they told her, after she had already paid …More

name: Kimberly Dinh
text: Call to place an order Ashley was the one to take the order she was rude have no manner don't know the meaning of customer service is I hope her boss see this n retrain her or get someone else that does a better job then her if not their business will go out of business very soon because of employees like her!

name: Shane Gilmer
text: Food is good here when you can get it. Not enough staff and no management, needs help badly;

name: Madhusudan Menon
text: They are consistent- in bad service, providing misinformation and the 'I don't care about you attitude." Second time in a row.

name: Ahmad Harris
text: Good, but not as good as the 1480 Terrell Mill Rd location.

name: Chris Wood
text: TERRIBLE service!!!!!Ordered at 7:30, called several times and was told pizzza would be here within an hour. Pizza never showed up and manager was extremely rude and never offered any assistance. Or refund for that mater. Worst customer …More

name: Mario Clark
text: Ordered and waited over 35 minutes to receive my order. Service was not up to par.

name: christy winn
text: Great fresh hot pizza, very nice and friendly, price very fair, and had coupons. Will be ordering again.

name: Jessica Lane
text: DO NOT ORDER FROM THEM!!!  Our pizza was over 45 minutes late...this is not the first time it has happened.  We were really excited when they came here, but it has not been the best experience.  Also, the pizza is normally under cooked.

name: Joshua 77
text: Clean joint, also good guys working there.

name: Head Hunters
text:
Great pizza  from this location
Best Pizza we have had from a Pizza Hut location in a long time, Pan Pizzas were perfect

name: Chris Sandy
text: Misleading advertising, deceptive practices. They advertise $10 for any pizza, any topping, any day. However, they actually charge you for extra cheese as well as other toppings without informing you. I will NOT be returning.

name: Scott Loska
text: Tried to order a pizza and was told they could not deliver to our address as we were not in their delivery area and sent us to a store further away. They are 2.2 miles. RUDE manager!! Dominos will get our business from now on.

name: Dorian Crown
text: Polite employees fast service provided.

name: Peter Horton
text: Not a very good pizza.. high cost for small pizza too..

name: cassundra Jones
text:
I see why they got less then 5 stars
The cashier wasn't friendly and the guy in the kitchen is fixing pizzas and not wearing gloves at all. …More

name: Wendel Blue
text: How I remember it.

name: steff kimball
text: Poorly staffed, often late, sub par customer service.

name: Painterly Rabbit
text: Pizza had no cheese!!! :( What is a pizza without its cheese?? Also took over an hour to get here. Strange.

name: Tania Machado
text: Dirty. Rude workers.

name: Varun Vijay
text: Oh yeah

name: Jeff K
text: The pizza was not cooked properly, nor was the price compelling.
